post.body: thanks for followin' me back. lookin forward to takin the show to kennedy center for your big week
hope you're keepin' warm in Chicago. Little chilly hanging w/Santa this week...Santa Barbara! :)
certainly we do darlin
already here, baby thanks, though
ever?! better than BHC?
you see what the Trib's sayin? "It's Not TV, it's HBOprah" - Love, love, it!
congrats to @lessig on the return back east. hope you enjoyed your visit, here, this wk
might spend some time lookin at places around telluride
how cute are those ladybug shoes? #surisshoes
isn't Tom's home beautiful? fun to be on his couch instead of the other way around, too.
hey, y'all! Is Gayle on here?
about to head out and enjoy the balmy day. what's @bffgayle up to?
retweeting @guykawasaki sol sender on dedigning obamas O http://ow.ly/AA
hey girl @bffgayle good to see you
laughing and thankful for all of your Oprah for Christmas Czar nominations - too funny
y'all goin to see Marley & Me tomorrow? (bring your hankies..)
Merry Christmas!
what are some of your favorite things? The best answers will be featured on fakeOprah's favorite things special
Nice to see @coloneltribune mention the Trib's coverage of the @chicagomag piece - thanks, boys!
thanks to @chicagpmag for the link to their 'Oprah Unbound' piece in this month's issue http://zi.ma/3edc45
RE: The PETA's Person of the Year honor. Thanks to Ingrid and your team for everything you do!
pooped after all the house hunting in gtown, dupont circle. and checy chase, but this 4 seasons is all too comfy
what are you doin to have the thriftiest holiday ever?
today's one of those days I'm glad we can park INSIDE the O-plex
there are way too many of you for it to be this quiet in here! Say hi when you got a chance, girl.
Our Man Barack has 150 fans. The mispelled Barrack has 1200. Thoughts?
heres the news on the new HBO deal http://tinyurl.com/55wex7 via @moryan
